001package Ch14_ColorimetricColor;
002
003import java.awt.color.ColorSpace;
004
005import ij.ImagePlus;
006import ij.ImageStack;
007import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
008import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
009import ij.process.ColorProcessor;
010import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
011import imagingbook.common.color.colorspace.HlsColorSpace;
012import imagingbook.common.color.colorspace.HsvColorSpace;
013import imagingbook.common.color.colorspace.LabColorSpace;
014import imagingbook.common.color.colorspace.LinearRgb65ColorSpace;
015import imagingbook.common.color.colorspace.LuvColorSpace;
016import imagingbook.common.image.ColorPack;
017
018/**
019 * ImageJ plugin, converts a sRGB color image to Lab, Luv, HLS, HSV or Linear
020 * RGB color space and shows the resulting components as a image stack
021 * (with float values).
022 * 
023 * @author WB
024 * @see imagingbook.common.color.colorspace.LabColorSpace
025 * @see imagingbook.common.color.colorspace.LuvColorSpace
026 * @see imagingbook.common.color.colorspace.HlsColorSpace
027 * @see imagingbook.common.color.colorspace.HsvColorSpace
028 * @see imagingbook.common.color.colorspace.LinearRgb65ColorSpace
029 * @see imagingbook.common.image.ColorPack
030 */
031public class Convert_To_Color_Stack implements PlugInFilter {
032        
033        private enum TargetSpaceType {
034                Lab, Luv, HLS, HSV, LinearRGB   // TODO: add XYZ
035        }
036        
037        private static TargetSpaceType TargetSpace = TargetSpaceType.Lab;
038        private static boolean ReconstructRGB = false;
039        
040        private ImagePlus im;
041
042        @Override
043        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus im) {
044                this.im = im;
045                return DOES_RGB + NO_CHANGES;
046        }
047
048        @Override
049        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
050                
051                if (!runDialog()) {
052                        return;
053                }
054                
055                String title = im.getShortTitle();
056                
057                ColorSpace csp = null;
058                switch(TargetSpace) {
059                case Lab: csp = LabColorSpace.getInstance(); break;
060                case Luv: csp = LuvColorSpace.getInstance(); break; 
061                case HLS: csp = HlsColorSpace.getInstance(); break;
062                case HSV: csp = HsvColorSpace.getInstance(); break;
063                case LinearRGB: csp = LinearRgb65ColorSpace.getInstance(); break;
064                }
065                
066                ColorPack cPack = new ColorPack((ColorProcessor) ip);
067                cPack.convertFromSrgbTo(csp);
068                
069                ImageStack stack = cPack.toImageStack();
070                new ImagePlus(title + "-" + TargetSpace.toString(), stack).show();
071                
072                if (ReconstructRGB) {
073                        cPack.convertToSrgb();
074                        ColorProcessor cp = cPack.toColorProcessor();
075                        new ImagePlus(title + "-RGB", cp).show();       
076                }
077        }
078        
079        // ---------------------------------------
080        
081        private boolean runDialog() {
082                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
083                gd.addMessage("Convert RGB image to Lab/Luv stack.");
084                gd.addEnumChoice("Target color space", TargetSpace);
085                gd.addCheckbox("Reconstruct RGB image", ReconstructRGB);
086                
087                gd.showDialog();
088                if (gd.wasCanceled())
089                        return false;
090                
091                TargetSpace = gd.getNextEnumChoice(TargetSpaceType.class);
092                ReconstructRGB = gd.getNextBoolean();
093                return true;
094        }
095
096}
